hero.title: The Savvy Pilot Protocol

headline.line1: Go from "Vague AI Idea" to "Working Pilot"

hero.subtitle: A structured, fixed-price engagement to validate AI value without months of development.

comparison.title: The Old Way vs. The Savvy Way

oldWay.title: THE OLD WAY
items: Teams afraid to touch what gets built

savvyWay.title: THE SAVVY PILOT PROTOCOL
items: A working tool you can use

phases.name: Phase 1: The Flight Plan
phases.description: We bring the right stakeholders together for a facilitated working session.
phases.detail: No lectures. We map real workflows, identify bottlenecks, and select one high-value target.

phases.name: Phase 2: The Takeoff
phases.description: We build the pilot immediately after alignment.
phases.detail: We connect to your data safely, configure the AI, and build a usable interface tied to real work.

phases.name: Phase 3: Ownership and Training
phases.description: We walk your team through how the pilot works.
phases.detail: We explain decisions, usage, and how to extend or modify the system over time.

items.name: Strategy Summary
items.description: A clear overview of opportunities, risks, and recommended next steps.

items.name: Working AI Pilot
items.description: A functional internal tool or application built on real logic and real data.

items.name: Training and Handoff
items.description: Clear explanations so your team is not dependent on us going forward.

items.question: Does this require our engineering team?
items.answer: No. We can build independently. Collaboration is welcome, but not required.

items.question: Is our data safe?
items.answer: Yes. We work within your existing security, data, and compliance constraints.

items.question: What happens after the pilot?
items.answer: You own the result. You can scale it, pause it, or bring us back for further work. No lock-in.

finalCta.title: Ready to Start?
finalCta.subtitle: Stop debating AI. Start using it.
